articles.author: Tierney Sneed, Marshall Cohen, Zachary Cohen, Devan Cole, Hannah Rabinowitz, Katelyn Polantz, Casey Gannon
articles.title: Donald Trump has been indicted in special counsel’s 2020 election interference probe - CNN
articles.description: Donald Trump has been indicted on criminal charges by a federal grand jury in a case that strikes at the former president’s efforts to remain in the White House after losing the 2020 election and undermine the long-held American tradition of a peaceful transf…
